page.title: 06A day in my life.James 9yrs.
page.content: At 6.30am I get up,have a wash,go downstairs and watch breakfast T.V. I have my breakfast which consists of cereal and toast then I go upstairs and clean my teeth and wake my brother up.Then I go down stairs and get dressed then I wait for the taxi that takes me to Beckfield Cross,where I wait for the bus to come at 8.00,to take me to Newport Bus Station.Then I walk to school,which is Nodehill Middle School.School starts at 8.30am. Then I have my lessons which are for example R.E.,Maths.Then I have play after that we may have English then it is dinner.My mum gives me Â£3.25. on Monday for my weekly dinner ticket of 20 units.After dinner we have more lessons which could be Home Education, Art&Craft or Music.At 3.30pm I leave school.I go home by bus and taxi.On Friday evenings I go to Cubs at Chale.
